import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; function StudentListFunc({students}) { const [student, setStudents] = useState(students); const [selectedStudent, setSelectedStudent] = useState(null); const [name, setName] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { // Call API search name const temp = students.filter(temp => temp.name.includes(name)) setStudents(temp) }, [name]) useEffect(() => { return () => { //clean up <=> componentWillUnmount } }, []) return ( <> setName(e.target.value)}/> { student.map((item, index) => ) }
STT Name Address Point Action
{index} {item.name} {item.address} {item.point} {selectedStudent && selectedStudent.id === item.id && (
Bạn có chắc muốn xoá sinh viên: {item.name}?
)}
) } export default StudentListFunc;
